## isEmptyValue() function

是否为空或异常值，不包括0 空值: null/undefined/'' 异常值: NaN 不包括空对象/空数组

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isEmptyValue(value: any): value is (null | undefined | '');
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | <code>any</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`value is (null | undefined | '')`
